hanzi-su-wiki:
姐

Значения

Старшая сестра

Мнемоника

Правая часть «кроме того» 且 выглядит как высокий стул, на которой сидит женщина 女, являющаяся твоей старшей сестрой. Она контролирует, когда мамы нет дома.

Варианты

姊, 姉

rtega_mnemonic:
姐姐RSelder sister, young lady
  • the sister 女 with most privileges at the table 且
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 且 indicates the sound; 女 (woman) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
姐妹 [ jiě mèi ]: sisters; siblings; sister (school, city etc)
大姐 [ dà jiě ]: big sister; elder sister; older sister (also polite term of address for a girl or woman slightly older than the speaker)
姐夫 [ jiě fu ]: (coll.) older sister's husband
表姐 [ biǎo jiě ]: older female cousin via female line
师姐 [ shī jiě ]: senior female fellow student or apprentice; daughter (older than oneself) of one's teacher

• ⿰ Left to right
    • 女 [ nǚ ] woman, girl; female
    • 且 [ qiě ] moreover, also (post-subject); about to, will soon (pre-verb)
heisig_chinese_memo: An older sister in a rich Chinese household is often treated with such care that she is like a woman who is put on a shelf (shelves) like an ornament.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: An older sister in a rich Chinese household is often treated with such care that she is like a woman who is put on a shelf (shelves) like an ornament.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " female " to " and ", it was used as a name for mother in the early days. Today it often refers to a woman who is a compatriot and is older than her. "Shuowen": "Shu is the mother and sister, Huainan is the society. From the female, and the sound." "Guangya‧ Shiqin": "Sister, mother." "Guangyun‧Ma Yun": "Sister, Qiang people call mother."

" Sister " can also refer to "brother" in general, that is, a woman older than herself. Song Wu Zeng's "Manual Records of Nenggai Zhai·Women Calling Sisters": "In modern times, female brothers are often used as elder sisters.

" Sister " can also be used as a general term for women. Yuan Guan Hanqing's "Lu Zhailang" wedge: "The young man calls for the golden man, the daughter calls for the jade sister." Modern Chinese calls unmarried women "Miss", and northern Mandarin uses the surname plus " sister " to refer to women of the same generation, like "Sister Zhang" and "Sister Li" also come from this usage.

" Sister " often expressed his compatriots and longer than the age of the woman, as "sister", "sister", "brothers and sisters" in " sister ", this table all righteousness. Tang Libai "Send Donglu Second Young Child": "The child is named Boqin, and he is also shoulders with his sister." The "cousin" and "cousin" mentioned in later generations also developed from this meaning.
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " female " and " and ", it was used as a name for mother in the early days. Today it often refers to a woman who is a compatriot and is older than her.
humanum_full_description:
從「女」，「且」聲，早期用作對母親的稱呼，今常表示同胞且年齡長於自己的女子。《說文》：「蜀謂母曰姐，淮南謂之社。从女，且聲。」《廣雅‧釋親》：「姐，母也。」《廣韻‧馬韻》：「姐，羌人呼母。」

　　「姐」也可泛指「女兄」，即年齡比自己大的女子。宋吳曾《能改齋漫錄‧婦女稱姐》：「近世多以女兄為姐，蓋尊之也。」

　　「姐」還能用作婦女的通稱。元關漢卿《魯齋郎》楔子：「小廝喚做金郎，女兒喚做玉姐。」現代漢語稱未婚女子為「小姐」，及北方官話以姓氏加「姐」稱呼同輩女性，如「張姐」、「李姐」，亦來自此用法。

　　「姐」常表示同胞且年齡長於自己的女子，如「姐姐」、「二姐」，「兄弟姐妹」中的「姐」，皆表此義。唐李白〈寄東魯二稚子〉：「小兒名伯禽，與姐亦齊肩。」後世所提及的「表姐」、「堂姐」，亦由此義發展而來。
humanum_short_description: 從「女」，「且」聲，早期用作對母親的稱呼，今常表示同胞且年齡長於自己的女子。

從「 女 」，「 且 」聲，早期用作對母親的稱呼，今常表示同胞且年齡長於自己的女子。《說文》：「蜀謂母曰姐，淮南謂之社。从女，且聲。」《廣雅‧釋親》：「姐，母也。」《廣韻‧馬韻》：「姐，羌人呼母。」 「 姐 」也可泛指「女兄」，即年齡比自己大的女子。宋吳曾《能改齋漫錄‧婦女稱姐》：「近世多以女兄為姐，蓋尊之也。」 「 姐 」還能用作婦女的通稱。元關漢卿《魯齋郎》楔子：「小廝喚做金郎，女兒喚做玉姐。」現代漢語稱未婚女子為「小姐」，及北方官話以姓氏加「 姐 」稱呼同輩女性，如「張姐」、「李姐」，亦來自此用法。 「 姐 」常表示同胞且年齡長於自己的女子，如「姐姐」、「二姐」，「兄弟姐妹」中的「 姐 」，皆表此義。唐李白〈寄東魯二稚子〉：「小兒名伯禽，與姐亦齊肩。」後世所提及的「表姐」、「堂姐」，亦由此義發展而來。

姐字的基本解释

姐
jiě
称同父母（或只同父、只同母）而比自己年纪大的女子：姐姐。姐夫。姐弟。
对比自己年纪大的同辈女性的称呼：表姐。师姐。大姐（a.对一般年轻妇女的称呼；b.对排行最大的姐姐的称呼）。
对未婚女子的通称：小姐（旧时称上层社会未婚女子，现多用于交际场合）。小大姐。
妹

姐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiě］
［《廣韻》兹野切，上馬，精。］
亦作“媎1”。
(1)称母亲。
(2)女兄。
(3)称本族或亲戚中同辈而年长于己的女性。
(4)对一般的同辈女性的敬称。
(5)女名用字。如魏文帝时有名妓謇姐，唐有名妓宠姐，《红楼梦》中有巧姐，现代戏曲中有刘三姐等。
(6)指妓女。
[②]［jù］
［《集韻》將豫切，去御，精。］
亦作“1”。
娇，骄纵。
[③]［zǐ］
［《集韻》蔣氏切，上紙，精。］
汉代少数民族名，属西羌。如彡姐、荡姐。参见《汉书·冯奉世传》。

姐字的英文翻译

◎ 姐
cousin-german, sister

姐字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　姐； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页258第27
〔古文〕她毑【唐韻】兹也切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】子野切，?同姉。【說文】蜀人呼母曰姐。今俗弟呼女兄曰姐。一曰慢也。　又【集韻】臻魚切，音菹。嬳姐，態也。　又蔣氏切，音紫。彡姐，西羌地名。【前漢·馮奉世傳】元帝永光二年，隴西羌彡姐，旁種反。【註】姐，音紫。今西羌尚有彡姐之姓。【集韻】作慈野切，音抯。又蕩姐，亦羌屬。【揚雄·諫書】籍蕩姐之場。　又【集韻】將豫切，音怚。【說文】驕也。【嵆康·幽憤詩】恃愛肆姐，不訓不師。○按彡姐肆姐?見史集。《正字通》何所考而云譌。

姐字的源字形

姐字的起名意思

称比自己年龄大的同辈女子。对未婚女子的通称小姐。

sister
Basic explanation of words
sister
jiě
Said the same parents (or only the same father, only the same mother) and older than her own woman: sister. Brother-in-law. Sister and brother.
Contrast yourself with the names of older women of your generation: cousin. Sister. Big Sister (a. The name for young women in general; b. The name for the oldest sister).
The general term for unmarried women: Miss (in the past, it was called unmarried women in the upper class, but now it is mostly used in social situations). Little sister.
sister
sister
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [jiě]
["Guangyun" cut wildly, mounted, refined. ]
Also known as "women 1".
(1) Call the mother.
(2) Brother.
(3) Women of the same generation but older than oneself in the family or relatives.
(4) Honorific title for women of the same generation in general.
(5) Use characters for female names. For example, there was a famous prostitute in the time of Emperor Wei Wen, a famous prostitute and a pet sister in the Tang Dynasty, a sister Qiao in "A Dream of Red Mansions", and a sister Liu in modern opera.
(6) Refers to prostitutes.
[②]［jù］
["Jiyun" cuts Yu, goes to imperial, refined. ]
Also called "1".
Jiao, arrogant.
[③] [zǐ]
["Ji Yun" cut by Jiang, put on paper, fine. ]
The name of the ethnic minority in the Han Dynasty belongs to Xiqiang. Such as sister 彡, sister Dang. See "Hanshu·Feng Fengshi Biography".
sister
